text: aur khuda hee ne tumhaare gharon ko tumhaara thikaana qaraar diya aur usee ne tumhaare vaaste chaupaayon kee khaalon se tumhaare lie (halake phulake) dere (kheme) bana jinhen tum halaka paakar apane saphar aur hajar (thaharane) mein kaam laate ho aur in chaarapaayon kee oon aur ruee aur baalo se ek vakt khaas (qayaamat tak) ke lie tumhaare bahut se asabaab aur abakaar aamad (kaam kee) cheeze banaee
